argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvgf.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvgf.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_nvgrp | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 5 | 4 | #P_grpofo | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> G : ( X X. X ) -onto-> X ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fof | |- ( G : ( X X. X ) -onto-> X -> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) |
| 7 | 3, 5, 6 | #P_3syl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) |
